title: 1  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.

title: 3  Workflows
text:
3.1 Get Descriptions

gh(glue("GET /orgs/{org}/repos")) |> 
  spread_all() |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  select(name, description) |>
  arrange(name) |> 
  kable()








name
description




MarineSensitivities.github.io
default website


api
application programming interface (API) using R Plumber package


apps
Shiny applications


docs
documentation for BOEM’s offshore environmental sensitivity index products


msens
R library of functions for mapping marine sensitivities, sponsored by BOEM


objectives
repository for issues spanning multiple repositories and doing big picture roadmapping


server
server setup for R Shiny apps, RStudio IDE, R Plumber API, PostGIS database, pg_tileserv


workflows
scripts for testing data analytics and visualization as well as production workflows

title: 5  API
text: Application Programming Interface (API) for generalizing data access.

title: 7  Docs
text: Documentation to describe workings of all the parts.

title: 3  Workflows
text:
4 Workflows
librarian::shelf(
  dplyr, gh, glue, tidyjson,
  quiet = T)

org   <- "MarineSensitivities"
repos <- c("workflows")
